sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import AppointmentForm from '../AppointmentForm/AppointmentForm'; import fmPrf from "../FindDoctorSearch/docprofilefml.svg"; import Popup from 'reactjs-popup'; import 'reactjs-popup/dist/index.css'; import { v4 as uuidv4 } from 'uuid'; const DrCard = ({pixsrc=fmPrf, drname="Dr James Gian" , specialty="Dentist" , noexp="23",}) => { const [showModal,setShowModal] = useState(false); const [appointments, setAppointments] = useState([]); const [bgColor,setBgColor] = useState("primary") const handleBooking = (appointmentEventData) =>{ console.log(appointmentEventData) const newAppointment = {id:uuidv4(),...appointmentEventData} setShowModal(false) setBgColor("danger") const updatedAppointment =[...appointments,newAppointment] setAppointments(updatedAppointment) } return (
{drname}

{specialty}

{noexp} years experience

Ratings:

Appointment Booked!

Name: Josh

Phone number: 023456

Cancel Appointments
setShowModal(true)}> { !appointments?. length?
Book Appointment
:
Cancel Appointments
}
No Booking Fees
} position="center" modal open={showModal} onClose={() => setShowModal(false)}> {(close) => (
{drname}

{specialty}

{noexp} years experience

Ratings:

{!appointments?.length?:

1 Booking available

}
)}
) } export default DrCard;
